name: prp
description: A comprehensive Product Requirements Prompt (PRP) workflow system for AI-driven feature development with systematic research, planning, and execution capabilities

commands.name: base-create
commands.description: Create a comprehensive base PRP with systematic research and context curation

commands.name: base-execute
commands.description: Execute an existing base PRP to implement the specified feature

commands.name: planning-create
commands.description: Create strategic planning documents for complex feature development

commands.name: spec-create
commands.description: Generate detailed technical specifications from requirements

commands.name: spec-execute
commands.description: Execute technical specifications to implement features

commands.name: story-create
commands.description: Create user stories with acceptance criteria and implementation details

commands.name: story-execute
commands.description: Execute user stories to deliver feature implementations

commands.name: task-create
commands.description: Break down features into actionable development tasks

commands.name: task-execute
commands.description: Execute individual tasks from the task list

commands.name: task-list-init
commands.description: Initialize and organize task lists for systematic development

commands.name: poc-create-parallel
commands.description: Create proof-of-concept implementations with parallel execution strategies

commands.name: poc-execute-parallel
commands.description: Execute POC implementations using parallel processing

commands.name: api-contract-define
commands.description: Define API contracts and interface specifications

commands.name: install-prp
commands.description: Install and configure the PRP workflow system

agents.name: codebase-analyst
agents.description: Specialized agent for deep codebase analysis, pattern recognition, and architectural insights

agents.name: library-researcher
agents.description: Expert agent for researching external libraries, documentation, and best practices

prp_directory.description: Directory where PRP documents are stored

parallel_execution.description: Enable parallel execution for POC workflows

auto_research.description: Automatically perform codebase and external research during PRP creation

changes: Initial release with comprehensive PRP workflow system
14 specialized commands for complete development lifecycle
2 expert agents for codebase analysis and library research
Complete task management and planning capabilities
